description:
This place is suitable for business travelers, students, adventurers and for people who seek new experiences in New York! 

About 1.5 blocks away is a super market. There is a J train approximately 3 blocks away and an L train 2.5 blocks away.

Our rooms available on the top floor are very clean and spacious with a safe neighborhood. The community is active amongst each other as well!

You will be able to access the WiFi, hot water, kitchen utensils, and other supplies given to you.

At my place, you will have an authentic experience of the NYC lifestyle and is close to supermarkets, deli's, small shops, and train stations.
name: Single Bed  room in townhouse, near subway
review:
Susy's place is very well located, just 5 mins away from two different subway stops. There's also a Supermarket and a Pharmacy just a couple of blocks away which come in very handy. 

The place has a very well equipped kitchen in case you prefer to cook your own food instead of eating out. 

She and her husband were very welcoming and helpful from day one.
